players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana's death is tragic. We need to be careful and share any info we have."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Alice is confirmed town."
Bob: "I trust my investigation. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie with me."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
